name: New AstroSurf
description:
Bounce. Dodge. Surf.
Use gravitational forces to dodge the planets, and see how far you can travel.
This pretty and hand drawn game is all about reflexes and spatial insights.

Collect coins and unlock the different space vessels.

Beware it is a very hard game!

Tap left, go left.
Tap right, go right.
Sounds simple?
Go and try it for yourself!
